description: Jint Engine Wrapper implementation requires the `ITransformationEngine` interface to be defined.
mitigation_plan: Task is assigned to the same sprint and team.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire core engine implementation.

description: The Plug-in Loader Service needs the `IConnector` interface to identify valid plug-ins.
mitigation_plan: Task is assigned to the same sprint and team.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire custom connector feature.

description: The Frontend Script List Page requires the backend API for listing scripts to be available.
mitigation_plan: Frontend team can develop against a mocked API contract until the backend API is deployed to a shared environment.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire UI development for script management.

description: The frontend preview logic implementation depends on the backend preview API contract, including its structured error response.
mitigation_plan: Define and agree upon the API contract early. Frontend can build against a mock server.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the completion of the live preview feature in the UI.
